channel.title: Error Compiling Commands.java

item.title: Error Compiling Commands.java
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[code] if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“check”) || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“reward”)) {
try {
VoteReward reward = Server.voteChecker.getReward(c.playerName.replaceAll(" ", “_”));
if(reward != null){
switch(reward.getReward()){
case 0:
//first reward
break;
case 1:
//seccond reward
break;
case 2:
//third reward
break;

                 default:
                    c.sendMessage("Reward not found.");
                    break;
              }
              c.sendMessage("Thank you for voting.");
           } else {
              c.sendMessage("You have no items waiting for you.");
           }
        } catch (Exception e){
           c.sendMessage("An error occurred please try again later.");
        }
     }

[/code]

item.title: Error Compiling Commands.java
item.dc:creator: @usmanm786 usmanm786
item.description:
@usmanm786 wrote:

i added vote4items and i keep getting 1 error which ive tried fixing loads of time, i need help

This is the error

This is the command

		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("check") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("reward")) {
			try {
				VoteReward reward = Server.voteChecker.getReward(c.playerName.replaceAll(" ", "_");
				if(reward != null){
					switch(reward.getReward()){
						case 0:
							//first reward
							break;
						case 1:
							//seccond reward
							break;
						case 2:
							//third reward
							break;
						
						default:
							c.sendMessage("Reward not found.");
							break;
					}
					c.sendMessage("Thank you for voting.");
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("You have no items waiting for you.");
				}
			} catch (Exception e){
				c.sendMessage("An error occurred please try again later.");
			}
		}

please help me

Read full topic
